By using several modules taught here like HIVE or PIG, students can leverage it to make some basic projects as well. People who are working in any other domain of information technology but wants to jump in as data scientists could be the perfect audience for this MapReduce certification course as nothing is best than a person willing to learn. Though it will be a bit hard to begin the things right after changing the domain, it’s also true that it won’t take much time to have you dive deep into this technology.

courseDetails.title: Blockchain Development on Ethereum
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to build blockchain applications using the Ethereum Blockchain from scratch
targetAudiences: The target audience for the Ethereum blockchain course all those candidates who are willing to learn about Ethereum and blockchain technology. The courses open for all the who wants to develop their career in the field of blockchain, cryptocurrency and I want to know how these technologies work into reality, cryptocurrency developers, investors looking forward to investing in Ethereum blockchain and the individuals who have some knowledge about cryptocurrency and want to expand their knowledge in the same domain too. All the individuals welcome for the course who have a desire to learn something new and advanced technology to develop their career and knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Der große Arduino/ESP Bastelkurs
courseDetails.shortDescription: Lerne in fünf tollen und interaktiven Bastelprojekten über 10 Sensoren und viele Features des ESP32 (ESP8266) kennen.
targetAudiences: An alle DIY'er und Hobby-Bastler mit Technik-Interesse
Schritt für Schritt Anleitung zum mitmachen und alle Codes zum download für ein frustfreies programmieren

courseDetails.title: Einstieg in die objektorientierte Programmierung mit Arduino
courseDetails.shortDescription: Eine praxisorientierte OOP-Anleitung mit vielen kleinen Arduino/ESP32-Projekten zum Mitmachen.
targetAudiences: Alle, die ihre Kenntnisse in der objektorientierten Programmierung (OOP) im Arduino-Umfeld vertiefen möchten.
Entwickler/innen die Interesse haben, Ihren Code auf das nächste Level zu bringen
Alle, die OOP verstehen, anwenden und selber schreiben wollen
Alle jene, die eine selbstgemachte Bibliotheken erstellen wollen
